div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos
dicti burgi subscriptos secundo die mensis octobris anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
octuagesimo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo secte

Eodem die Alexander meignes electus fuit ad officium prepositure huius burgi
pro vno anno futuro prestito solito Juramento

Et Jacobus lesly Alexander de camera filius Thomas fife et Andreas
branch electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum

Et philippus de Dunbrek Alexander de camera Dauid Duncanj et Duncanus de
stralogh continuati fuerunt in seriendos pro vno anno futuro

Item eodem die accedens ad barram Alexander de camera de murchil tempore
prosecucionis vnius processus fact' per magistrum thomam stane ex parte capel
lanorum collegij ecclesie parrochiali huius burgi de Abirdene super Recuperacione vnius
annuj Redditus xiij solidorum et iiijor d' exeunt' annuatim de vna terra
dicti Alexandri de camera Jacente in capite vici nauium inter terram ipsius Alexandri
ex parte boriali et terram nunc thome prat ex parte australi dicens et allegans
quod processus ducti per dictum magistrum thomam ex parte dictorum capellanorum sunt
nulli nec alicuius valetudinis pro tunc neque elapsis temporibus / ex et pro eo
quia nullum habuit procuratorum huiusmodi capellanorum ad prosequendum dictum
annuum redditum Quare solempniter protestatus fuit quod quicquid actum fuit temporibus
retroactis et pro tunc nullum dampnum seu preiudicium sibi generaret quo ad feodum
et hereditatem suam

Item eodem die comparens ad barram magister Alexander fife capellanus ac procurator altaris
Sancti michaelis archangeli protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu xl denariorum eidem
altari et sibi debito annuatim de quadam terra vasta supradicta Jacente in capite vici
nauium Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo Redditu preter
terram et lapides quos presentavit in sacculo coram ballivis in curia tanquam tercio die huius
processus Testibus Roberto de Kintor Jacobo de Kintor burgensibus et phillipo de
Dunbrek seriendo

Item eodem die accesserunt ad barram Johannes de Kintor filius et heres quondam gilberti de Kintor
et macolmus mowet eius curatus et protestati fuerunt pro vno annuo Redditu xiiij
s' eidem Johanni annuatim et hereditate debit' de quadam terra vasta Johannis Wode vt
patet in rotulamento quos presentaverunt in sacculo coram ballivis in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo blindsel seniore Willelmo more burgensibus et Duncano straloch sergeando

ffynlaus fores eodem die tanquam primo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi blindsel iunioris pro
iniusta detencione xlv s' non comparuit / quare precipitur seriendo capere districtum octo solidorum
ab eodem et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem iiijto die mensis octobris
anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Johannes de catnes conuictus per assisam amerciatur quare iniuste pertur
bavit Andream lambynton' et matrem ac sororem eiusdem andree in verbo et tenetur
emendare eisdem ad visum proborum virorum
Item Idem andreas in amerciamento pro perturbio dicti Johannis catnes in verbo et tenetur emendare vt supra

Et ijdem andreas et Johannes quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem in presenti curia affirmata prout compertum
fuit per assisam et hoc in verbo

Willelmus blindsel iunior deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne catnes quod Andreas lambynton' erit
indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Et andreas lammynton' inuenit Alexandrum rede plegium legalem de indempnitate Johannis de
catnes aliter quam Jura volunt

The sammyn' dai in the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe eftir none Johne buk accu
sit for the wrangwis' strublans and hurting of ser Allan of chamer chaplan in the owre
riding of the said ser Allan with his hors' / the said Johne put him in wil of the balye
is of the said strublans quharfor he was adiugit in amerciament of the court and
til amend til him as law wil

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum balliuos et fratres gilde eiusdem die vener
is proximo post festum beati michaelis archangeli videlicet vjto die octobris anno Dominj supradicto

Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in communes consiliarios huius burgi pro vno anno et cetera
Alexander de camera de murchil
Johannes de marr'
Johannes de Knollis
Dauid colison'
Robertus de culane
Robertus blindsel
Alexander rede
Johannes Wormot
gilbertus Waus
Dauid menyes
Thomas prat
Alexander howison'
Dauid symsoune
alexander de marr'

Eodem die Alexander Rede electus fuit in thesaurarium seu depositarium bonorum
communium huius burgi pro vno anno futuro prestito fidelitatis Juramento

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Johannes stewart murthacus glenmalvine Willelmus necolson Willelmus de garuiach
Ranaldus talyour Robertus prat Duncanus smyth Alexander rolland henricus mortymer
Willelmus de tulidef thomas gardnar Jacobus de Kintor Robertus club Donaldus
de strathachin

div.head: Gustatores ceruisie
div.p:
Nicholaius leil et Willelmus raa pro le evyn' quartar Item de li crukit quartar
Thomas club et georgius Dys' Item pro quarterio de le grene Johannes Kympty et
Alexander huchonson Et pro quarterio de futy Andreas haw et thomas talyour

Item eodem die prepositus balliui consules et communitas huius burgi matura deliberacione
et tractatu prehabitis consencierunt et fideliter promiserunt Quod discretus vir dominus
Andreas de camera capellanus habebit presentacionem domus hospitalis
Sancti Thome martiris situati infra dictum burgum ac capellanie seruicij et
officij eiusdem cum suis pertinenciis pro toto tempore vite sue sub eorum sigillo communi
in forma presentacionis debita et consueta / hiis Testibus Alexandro menyes preposito Ja
cobo lesly Alexandro de camera filio Thoma de fife Andrea branche ballivis Alexandro
Rede thesaurario Johanne de Knollis Roberto de culane Roberto blindsel Johanne
Wormot gilberto Vaus Dauid menyes thoma prat Alexandro howison Dauid symson'
Alexandro de marr patricio badenagh et domino Roberto leis notario publico Item tamen quod
post Resignacionem factam dicte domus hospitalis seu capellanie officij et seruicij
eiusdem dicti prepositus ballivi consules et communitas incontinen' dabunt et deliberabunt eorum
presentacionem in scriptis / sub eorum sigillo communi in forma debita et consueta vt predicti dicto
domino Andree absque variacione seu contradictione aliquali secundum tenorem et formam fun
dacionis premene dicte domus hospitalis seu capellanie antedicte

Eodem die Alexander rede obligatus fuit et deuenit fideiussor preposito ballivis et consulibus pre
dictis pro domino Andrea de camera capellano / quod ipse dominus Andreas obseruabit
et gubernabit hospitale Sancti Thome martiris in omnibus necessarijs secundum
formam et tenorem premene fundacionis dicti hospitalis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xjo die octobris anno
Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Willelmus iacobi et Johannes trail frater eius quilibet eorum in
amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti browstar Et dictus Robertus in amerciamento pro iniusta pertur
bacione dictorum Willelmi et Johannis / et tenetur emendare vt exigit ordo Juris

Eodem die Thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto Roberto browstar' quod dicti
Willelmus et Johannes erunt indempnes et pars sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et Dauid marr'
deuenit plegius legales pro dictis Willelmo et Johanne de indempnitate Roberti broustar et partis sue aliter
quam Jura volunt et cetera

Beit maid kend' til al men be thir presentis me mastir Androw Cadiow burges
of Abirdene to be bundin and oblist / and be thir presentis bundis and oblis' me / to the Aldirman
Counsale and communite of the said burgh / that forsamekle' as thai haue grantit
to my aunte cristian Cadiow and to me and my assignais / ane half nett of the
Rake / or ellis als gude / for al the termes that salbe contenit in thair next asseda
cioun / that I sal nocht at ony tyme / tocum make ony man my assignay in the
said half nett or take / bot a nychtbour man indwellar' of the towne' as I
thinke maist expedient and profitable' but fraude or gile In witnes
quherof I haue writin thir presentis with my hand' at Abirdene the xj dai of
October' the yere of god jM iiijC lxxx yeris Andreas Cadiow
manu propria

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xiijo die mensis octobris
Anno Dominj supra dicto

The quhilk day anent ten s' scottis clamit be Androw murray eldar fra John'
stewart the quhilkis the said androw gaf him toby canves the assise has
fundin and deliuerit / that gif androw murray wil swere that he deliuerit and gafe
the said x s' to the said John' toby canves with / that the said John' for four' s' g'
in flaundris tobe warit / that the said Johne sal content him within lauchful terme
the quhilk aith the said Androw has made in presence of the court And the said
John' in amerciament for the wrangwis' withhalding and denying of the said some'

Item the sammyn' dai Johne the Waus yungar' has constitute and ordanit Johne
colison' and Alexander rede his lauchful procuratouris coniunctlie and seueraly to folou
a barel of salmond arrestit in James of Douglas handis be the saide
John' and in al vthiris actionis and causis concerning him within the said burgh promit
tand to hald ferme and stabil

Curia legalis burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xvj die
octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

Eodem die fyndelaus fores secundo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi blindsele
iuniorum pro iniusta detencione xlv s' Non comparuit Et Ideo precipitur philippo de
Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum de ipso fyndelao et premunire eundem ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem huius processus

Item eodem die Johannes stevynson' super quem Dauid mathoson extendit plegius
pro iniusta detencione xxxiij s' et vij d' ab eo ad bonum compotum primo die vocatus
ad comparendum responsurus dicto plegio / non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch
vni sergeandorum capere disctrictum de ipso Johanne et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam diem
legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus

Eodem die Johannes stevinson' super quem Willelmus moyses extendit plegium quod iniuste
detinet ab eo xxxv s' ad bonum compotum / primo die sepe vocatus ad comparendum responsurus
dicto plegio Non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriendo capere
districtum de dicto Johanne et premunire eundem ad proximam diem legalem tanquam 2m diem processus

Alexander hil et Willelmus leis pelliparij conuicti per assisam ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur
in amerciamento pro iniusta percussione et lesione Archibaldi pellipariij et tenentur emen
dare parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

The sammyn dai in the court before the ballies Wat pyot wes oblist til deliuer
and pay / til thomas prat / xxvj eln' of quhite clath custum fre als gude as
his awne wes betuix this and mertymes next tocum / And syne thareftir in the
said court / Dauid mathoson' appointit and accordit thaim / that Wat pyot sal pay for the
forsaidis xxvj eln' of clath and for the custum and al til the said thomas prat xxxvj
s' and viij d' of vsuale money / the quhilk payment the said Walter is oblist
tomak til thomas prat betuix this and the said terme of mertymes

Item the said dai Alexander rede John' the Waus thomas prat William blindsel yungar'
Dauid mathoson' and / androw murray eldar arbitrouris and amicabil compositouris chosin and
sworn' anent the debate and clame of certane wax betuix James andirson and Robert
ewynson' and thar complicis on the ta part / and thomas scrogis ane of the awnaris of
the hulk callit mary on the tothir partie / the saidis parties beand oblist tovndirly and
fulfil thar determinacion and ordinance The quhilkis persounis Riply avisit deliuer
is and ordanis thomas scrogis to free al the marchandis walx that lyis
now in Dunde and todeliuer the sammyn' to the merchandis tharof thai payand the fracht /
within xx dais nixt tocum

Item the said James andirson has constitute androw murray eldar and Wilyam gray coniunctlie and
seueraly his procuratouris to ressaue a last of his gudis togiddir with his part of the
walx fra thomas scrogis

Item eodem die Johannes stevinson primo die vocatus ad sectam Walteri pyot pro iniusta detencione
duarum bollarum grossi salis . non comparuit quare precipitur seriendo capere districtum ab ipso Johanne
et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad 2m diem huius processus

Die xixna mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo Coram Thoma de fife vno bal
liuorum huius burgi Robertus ewynson constituit et ordinavit prouidos viros patricium
badenach et Andream murref iuniorem coniunctim et divisim sous viros legittimos procuratores
in omnibus causis placitis et querelis ipsum concernentibus infra dictum burgum / Et signanter
ad petendum nomine suo et optinendum plegium et securitatem de solucione et deliberacione certe cere
aliis per eum optent' super thomam scrogis / et ad respondendum pro naulo suo / necnon ad agendum et
defendendum pro eo in premissis vt Jura volunt Ipso promittens de Rato cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis Testibus patricio fife Andrea ewynson et aliis

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem vicesima die mensis et
anni predictorum

Quo die Johannes chepman inuenit gilbertum de camera plegium legalem pro eo
quod Alexander howison et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Et gilbertus leche deuenit plegium legalem pro Alexandro howison' quod Johannes chepman et
pars sua erunt indempnes pro ipso alexandro et parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt

The samyn dai / the assise has fundin and deliuerit that the maistir and the clerc of
the hulk callit mary sal deliuer a barrel of tar til Johne of marr' the
quhilk Johne serssaue his merchand laid in the said schip as was previt
before the assise / and tobe deliuerit within terme of law

Johannes de balcromby conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi
moyses in verbo et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Thomas litstar in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbavit Cristianam sponsam Willelmi scrymgeour
Et eadem cristiana amerciatur pro perturbio dicti thome

Eodem die actio mota per Willelmum Roberti contra thomam Watson' penes certas
iniurias et perturbias alias sibi illatas Respectuatur vsque hodie ad octo dies
quo die dicte partes subiacebunt Juri in curia huius burgi absque aliqua ex
cepcione sue Juris priuilegio / Insuper dictus Willelmus dedit Robertum blindsel plegium
legalem pro eo quod thomas Watson et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter Dauid menyes deuenit plegius legalis pro
thoma Watson quod dictus Willelmus roberti et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo
et / parte sua aliter quam Jura volunt / Et quod dicte partes comparebunt dicto die
Responsurus et Juri pariturus
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxiij die octobris anno predicto

quo die Dauid Dow conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbavit Johannem
chavmer et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Jacobus pelliparius in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Archibaldi pelliparij prout
compertum fuit per assisam et tenetur emendare ei vt Jura volunt

The xxvj day of october the yer' of god M iiijC et lxxx / In the tolbuthe before
the Aldirman and ballies of this burgh Dauid Duncan' and Duncan straloch twa of
the seriandis grantit thaim tilhaf tane John' of Knollis souertie and borch for xxviij
s' and vj d' for William lip acht til Adam of craufurd be the said William for
his hous' mail of termis bigane and tobe pait betuix this and Witsonday
next tocum

Curia tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die mensis
octobris anno Domini supradicto

Quo die Thomas Watson' et Johannes Watson conuicti per assisam ipsorum
quilibet adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta peturbacione Willelmum ro
bertson et emendare eidem vt Jura volunt

Et dictus Willelmus roberti in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione grauj prefati thome
Watson vt assisa reperiit et tenetur emendare dampnum ad visum proborum hominum

Eodem die Duncanus smyth deuenit plegius legalis pro thoma Watson et Johanne
Watson' quod Willelmus roberti erit indempnis de eius aliter quam per viam Juris
Simili modo idem Willelmus inuenit magnum Wormot plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate
dictorum thome et Johannis aliter quam exigit ordo Juris

the samyn' dai the Aldirman and ballies chargit thom of marr' Alexander trail et thom
of scrogis awnaris and maistiris of the hulk callit mary til free and deliuer'
betuix this and mononday til James andirson his gudis and ressaue thar' fracht

Item the said day before the Aldirman' and consale comperit a worschipful man
mastir John' the hay prebendar' of Crowdan and askit at thaim toger David
hil comper' tofulfil his oblising anent the amendis tobe made of the pub
lic iniure done til him be the said Dauid eftir the tenour and fourm of the actis
producit and schewin tharupon / the quhilk Dauid comperand / becaus' he wes
oblist til vndirly the said mastir Johnis wil / thare in presence of the aldirman and
consile / that it suld haf bene done be avise of thaim the said mastir Johne
schew and sayde that his desire and wil was that the said Dauid
this next sonday suld cum in the procession before the hie mes in Sanct
Nicholace kirk barefute and barehede in a lows' govn' with a candil
of ij li' of wax in takyn' of his offence / and ask the said mastir John'
forgifnes or quhom vthir he wald deput tharto in his absens and require
the aldirman and consile topray the said mastir John' to remit him and offir'
the candil to the haly blude lycht at sanct Nicholes altar And attour
that the said Dauid suld pay to the biging of the qvere of sanct Ni
colace of the said burgh x li' at the wil of the said mastir John'
and of the aldirman and consale forsaid / the quhilk ordinance and emendis
the said Dauid wald nocht grant til do nochtwithstanding that he wes chargit
tharto be the said mastir John' be virtu of his oblising

The sammyn dai Comperit before the Aldirman and ballies of Abirdene William blind
sel yungar' burges of the said burgh . the quhilk fand Duncan of sanchar' of murcroft
and Johne malisson' burgez of Abirdene souertiez for him for the payment of twa
li xvij s' g' of the money of flaundris tobe pait til peter Deusermont portour
of brugis in the erast schippis passand god willand . out of the havyn' of
abirdene with merchandice cumand in the partis of flandris eftir the date of this write
apon' this condicione and maner' that is tosay gif the said peter wil mak gude
faith in presence of notabil witnes / that he is vnpait of the said sowme or ony
part tharof be quhilum Androw more . or be ony vthir on the said Williamis behalf
the quhilk had charge tharof as he allegis / that the said peter salbe content and pait
at the owre cuming of thar erast schippis but ony langar' delay And this the
said Williamis souertiez ar oblist to do and fulfil vndir the pain of sevyn' noblis'
for the pund g' tobe pait til the said peter and his procuratouris gif it falyeis
of the payment forsaid . And the said Wilyam is oblist be his land and gudis tofreith
his saidis souertiez / and this wes done with consent of copyn van Reif procuratour til peter Deuser
mont in presence alsua of Dauid rudeman messinger seref in that part

The xxviij dai of october' the yer' forsaid the aldirman and ballies of the said burgh
and Dauid rudeman seref in that part / at the command' of our Soueran lord be his lettres
passit til Robert blindsel tocompel and distrenye him to the avale of twa li' xvij s' g'
optenit apon him be peter Deusermondis procuratour / the quhilk Robert offerit him to
prefe the some' pait / Nochtwithstanding he has fundin Thomas of marr' and Ste
vyn' giffard souertiez for him takin with the consent of Copyn' van Reif procuratour
til peter Deusermond / that gif at the owrecuming of thir erast schippis / the said
peter grantis him nocht pait on the said Robertis behalf of the some' forsaid and
makis faith in presence of the said Robertis souertiez and procuratouris / that he is nocht
content / the said peter salbe content and pait at the owrecuming of the erast schippis
but ony langar dilay / he deliuerand the said Robertis obligacion or ane acquittance
to the makaris of the said payment / And this his saidis souertiez ar oblist
til do and fulfil vndir the pain of vij noblis' for the pund g' tobe pait til the
said peter and his procuratouris gif it falyeis of the payment forsaid / And the
said Robert is oblist be his land and gudis tofreith his souertiez kepand thame
scaithles and to deliuer his obligacion tharupon

Item the sammyn dai in like wise becaus' Thomas scrogis offerit him to prefe
the some' of twa li' xix s' iij g' payit optenit apon him be Copin van Reif procurator
for peter Deusermonde as is mare fullely contenit in our soueran lordis lettres direct tharupon
Nochtwithstanding the aldirman and balyeis and seref in that part forsaidis has takin thomas
of marr' souertie for the said thomas scrogis with consent of the said copyn' that gif at the
owre cuming of thar erast schippis the said peter grantis him nocht pait of the some'
forsaid and makis faith tharto the said peter salbe content and pait at the owre cuming
of thar erast schippis but ony langar delay And this the said thomas scrogis and his
souertie ar' oblist til do and fulfil vndir the pain of vij noblis' for the li' g' tobe
pait til the said peter and his procuratouris gif it falyeis of the payment forsaid / and
thomas scrogis is oblist be his hand and gudis til obserue his said souertie scathles and togif
tharupon' his obligacion et cetera
